R1:
en
conf t
hostname R1
int g0/0
ip add 192.168.0.1 255.255.255.0
no sh 
exit
int s0/0/0
ip add 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.252
no sh
exit
int s0/0/1
ip add 192.168.5.2 255.255.255.252
no sh
exit
ip route 192.168.2.0 255.255.255.0 192.168.1.2
ip route 192.168.3.0 255.255.255.252 192.168.1.2
ip route 192.168.4.0 255.255.255.0 192.168.1.2
ip route 192.168.2.0 255.255.255.0 192.168.5.2 150
ip route 192.168.3.0 255.255.255.252 192.168.5.2 150
ip route 192.168.4.0 255.255.255.0 192.168.5.2 150

R2:
en
conf t
hostname R2
int g0/0
ip add 192.168.2.1 255.255.255.0
no sh 
exit
int s0/0/0
ip add 192.168.1.2 255.255.255.252
no sh
exit
int s0/0/1
ip add 192.168.3.1 255.255.255.252
no sh
exit
ip route 192.168.4.0 255.255.255.0 192.168.3.2
ip route 192.168.5.0 255.255.255.252 192.168.3.2
ip route 192.168.0.0 255.255.255.0 192.168.1.1
ip route 192.168.4.0 255.255.255.0 192.168.1.1 150
ip route 192.168.5.0 255.255.255.252 192.168.1.1 150
ip route 192.168.0.0 255.255.255.0 192.168.3.2 150

R3:
en
conf t
hostname R3
int g0/0
ip add 192.168.4.1 255.255.255.0
no sh 
exit
int s0/0/0
ip add 192.168.5.1 255.255.255.252
no sh
exit
int s0/0/1
ip add 192.168.3.2 255.255.255.252
no sh
exit
ip route 192.168.2.0 255.255.255.0 192.168.3.1
ip route 192.168.1.0 255.255.255.252 192.168.3.1
ip route 192.168.0.0 255.255.255.0 192.168.3.1
ip route 192.168.2.0 255.255.255.0 192.168.5.2 150
ip route 192.168.1.0 255.255.255.252 192.168.5.2 150
ip route 192.168.0.0 255.255.255.0 192.168.5.2 150
